description :

description.value: **Which diagnostic discipline/department created the report** **NOTE**: This US Core SearchParameter definition extends the usage context of the [Conformance expectation extension](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/extension-capabilitystatement-expectation.html) - multipleAnd - multipleOr - comparator - modifier - chain
